message: Welcome! You're considering a high-quality product today. Our records show that our high-quality items are well-received by our buyers. Given their value and rarity, I believe you'll find this product to be a worthwhile investment. Please consider purchasing it for $100.
I'd like to decline the offer for now. I'd like to see some data on the products before making a decision.

However, our low-quality items are still carefully selected to ensure they meet certain standards. Given the price of $100, we hope you'll find this item to be a good deal.
